Text: Thank you! This is a great upload and worked flawlessly for me.
will this work with the usb installer tool from microsoft?

@eddiext

I'm not sure about microsoft's tool, but I was using Rufus to create the Bootable USB that I used on my friend's computer.

Nice, clean torrent. Works perfectly with an old Packard Bell laptop I was fixing for a friend. Used their genuine Vista Home Premium product key and activated flawlessly (via phone).

Full Avast, MBAM, Spybot scans show no hidden nasties.
